comments.content:
Difficult to tell because of the angle, but here are a few possibilities:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192530/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192530/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/charter-oak/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/imperial/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192530/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/imperial/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/imperial/")
will check ... thanks for the quick response kthomps5
Jerry, I found a larger, less angled photo of one of their buses, and I'm pretty confident that the typeface is Charter Oak (see second link above).
Charter Oak was absolutely the correct font , kthomps5 you rock... sorry this comes so late...
